kpi.name: M1034C2

kpi_info.title: INTER SYSTEM HHO NRT ATTEMPTS PER OPER
kpi_info.use: The number of inter-system handover attempts for NRT. The call is considered as NRT from handover point of view when only NRT RABs exist. UPDATED: After handover decision, when the RNC sends the RRC: CELL CHANGE ORDER FROM UTRAN message to the UE. This counter is updated on any trigger reason.

kpi.kpi_alias: INTER SYSTEM HHO NRT ATTEMPTS PER OPER
